Web Console

The Web Console section controls the settings for the WebAdmin Console. Some of these settings include:

  • Session Timeout
  • Log Settings
  • Access Control
  • Create/Delete Admin Users
  • Reset Admin Passwords
  • WebAdmin Listeners & SSL Settings
